channel.title: Update of Tor unix sockets option
channel.description:
Just an FYI in case we use something that can break with this change.
> Minor bugfixes (man page, SocksPort): > >Remove dead code from the old "SocksSocket" option, and rename SocksSocketsGroupWritable to UnixSocksGroupWritable. The old option still works, but is deprecated. Fixes bug 24343; bugfix on 0.2.6.3.

item.title: Update of Tor unix sockets option
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
HulaHoop:

Just an FYI in case we use something that can break with this change.

Minor bugfixes (man page, SocksPort):

Remove dead code from the old “SocksSocket” option, and rename SocksSocketsGroupWritable to UnixSocksGroupWritable. The old option still works, but is deprecated. Fixes bug 24343; bugfix on 0.2.6.3.

mygrep -r -i SocksSocket

No mention in Whonix source code so considered done.

Read full topic
item.source: Update of Tor unix sockets option
